name: Aletoirs Feast
description:
Entry for the "One Map Challenge" from the Official RPG Maker forums.

A strange entity brings you to his home, the "Voidrealm" hoping you have the strength to succeed in the mission to avoid their collapsing.

You play as an Aletoir a mystery hero who has the power of transform into a randomized hero, each one with their unique abilities and playstyles, use this to your advantage and siege the 5 zones of the Voidrealm, seeking their bosses and defeat them before the end of this realm.

But the journey is hard and with the incapacity of saving your progress, maybe one Aletoir is not enough to fulfill the quest so in case you lose or want to start a new game, a different hero may come to give another chance, with different items and different bosses that gonna make every game unique

¿You will save the Voidrealm?, ¡Attempt it with the randomized powers of Aletoirs!

Made it with plugins from:

- Yanfly Engine (http://www.yanfly.moe/wiki/Category:Yanfly_Engine_Plugins)
- Fallen Angel Olivia (http://www.yanfly.moe/wiki/Category:Fallen_Angel_Olivia)
- SRDude (http://sumrndm.site/)
- DreamX

Download now Aletoirs Feast 1.0
